chapters.title: Chapter 36: Among the Elders
chapters.info: Neysa Ayellin, p. (456)—Woman from Emond's Field, mother of Marisa. Neysa is mistakenly named as the girl who finds Mat handsome in some editions of the books; Neysa is of course the mother, and Marisa the daughter near Mat's age. See also Ayellin, Marisa.
